author: davidbau
msg: One-liner fix for a recently reported compilation error, when
xs:decimal restrictions fit into a BigInteger but not a long.
Applies to both v1 and v2.
Regression tests: "ant drt" passed on both v1 and v2

author: cezar
msg: Integrating the new xpath implementation in XmlCursor.selectPath().
In order to use this implementation one has to have build/private/lib/xbean_xpath.jar and build/lib/jaxen.jar on the classpath.
